Cleanliness Overall very acceptable, the room is a bit old but clean, especially the bathrooms which is important to us. Other points: very friendly staff breakfast was nice free internet Conclusion: It is one of those hotels that are perfect for a place to sleep and leave your stuff while visiting a city. Its cute, clean, friendly and serves it's purpose as a decent place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, friendly service”
Reviews.Author: pchordia
Reviews.Content: Good Small friendly hotel. Made special breakfast(vegetarian) for us.

Reviews.Title: “ONLY ONE WORD : P E R F E C T”
Reviews.Author: ELENI64
Reviews.Content: The location of the hotel is convenient and you have the opportunity of walking distance of many of your magnificent city's main monuments, attractions, shops, restaurants, cafe, tram, buses etc. The hotel was perfect, very clean, large room, comfortable bed, quiet, wonderful breakfast room with amazing view to Bosphorous sea. The staff were very kind, friendly and helpful. We'll come back soon to this unbelievable city! Many thanks and regards to "Sumengen" Hotel! Eleni Tantalidou & Spiros Lavranos, Athens, Greece

Reviews.Title: “a charming, advisable base for your stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: lattediluna
Reviews.Content: an ancient home properly restored; an astonishing breakfast room with view throughout Bosphorus; large bedrooms according with the hotel's level: what could you wish more for a relax after and before a busy day in Istanbul? Perhaps the heating system is a bit too high if any mild weather comes suring the winter...

Reviews.Title: “Warm and Friendly Welcome”
Reviews.Author: vineshotel
Reviews.Content: I would like to congratulate this hotel. I arranged three rooms for a group of friends for four nights in Istanbul. We wanted to be central and the hotel needed to be convenient for all the main sites. Its position is really excellent. It is always daunting when booking on behalf of others but we were all really pleased with the standrd and location of the hotel. Rooms were cleaned brilliantly with sheets being chaged every day. The rooms were well equiped and of a good size. Staff and Management were welcoming and efficient. Before our arrival, e mails were very accurate and the hotel even arranged transport on our behalf.

Reviews.Title: “Charming hotel with the perfect Istanbul location”
Reviews.Author: AnnArborWanderer
Reviews.Content: My grown daughter and I had a perfect 8-day stay at this small, clean, and welcoming hotel in the heart of Sultanament. The staff were friendly and helpful, our twin beds were comfortable, and the view from both our room and the breakfast room of the Sea of Marmara was lovely. In January we weren't able to sit outside to eat, but I can imagine it would be great overlooking the rooftops. As it was, the wonderful heated floors were more important than the outside eating area. Our only disappointment is that the the WIFI didn't work, so we had to use the computer in the lobby to get online. Other than that, it was perfect for us, and we'd absolutely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay at my favorite hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Ates
Reviews.Content: As a single woman travelling I always like to inform others who are looking for "one of those great finds." On my latest trip to the US from Turkey I stayed at the Sumengen Hotel again the night before my departure. My trip was unexpected and urgent for family illness in the US and they anticipated every need. The hotel's location in the heart of Sultanahment only 15 minutes from airport is a huge advantage and it's beautiful and restful so I can really unwind before or after that long flight. The staff--who are quite fluent in English on all shifts--are excellently trained and can help in any situation. The manager is calm, professional and always available on site or by phone.it's a great place to stay!!!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome, Clean Hotel in a Great Location and a Great Price.”
Reviews.Author: Ari001
Reviews.Content: This Hotel is Awesome and very close to the Blue Mosque, Hippodrome, Aya Sofia, Museums and many nice restaurants. I stayed at this hotel four times in the last year and a half and I will stay there again. It is really nice, romantic, with great dÃ©cor. The staff is consistently great as are the rooms. There is a train track nearby, however the windows are of superb quality and the noise is not minimal.

Reviews.Title: “nice but not 4 stars”
Reviews.Author: egytraveler
Reviews.Content: very helpful staff, very friendly specially with children location is great very close ti Haya Sofia and the blue mosque no high chair in the restaurant, breakfast is fine but not the pastries room nice and spacious but noisy, TV channels all in Turkish except the BBC and CNN the linen was not changed although they got dirty from our 2nd day of stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great place, great people, great food”
Reviews.Author: Koumara
Reviews.Content: In a few words : the place is very well located, in the heart of the touristic district of Sultanhamet. The rooms are spacious, very clean and the bathroom was to be compared to any bathroom of high standards hotel in Europe (Mercure or Sofitel). The hammam is in fact in the hotel next door and we did not try it. On the top of it breakfasts are great and "all you can eat" and the people from the staff were very patient and helpful (restaurant/ touristic advice and efficient support in dealing with lost lugage !!).

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel in a wonderful position”
Reviews.Author: ringhioMilan
Reviews.Content: excellent value for money and best position in Istanbul - very good breakfast -friendly staff room very clean -

Reviews.Title: “Great location, lovely staff!”
Reviews.Author: lizzynorm
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a lovely location, really convenient for many of the places you might want to see while you are in Istanbul. The rooms are nice and big and kept very clean. Really friendly, helpful staff and a fabulous breakfast buffet in a lovely room overlooking the river.

Reviews.Title: “Unless the fact that we stayed only one night due to circumstances, the service and hospitality was great.”
Reviews.Author: JanDoedel
Reviews.Content: Two negative points: * Third bed (couch) has a thin matress * Very noise rooms (due to railway and neighbouring rooms) For the rest: magnificent qualitiy for reasonable price (via www.booking.com)!

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: Elecsys
Reviews.Content: Good location within walking distance of all the major sights. The room was clean and spacious. Staff was very polite and helpful. Breakfast could be better and we didnÂ´t really appreciate the birds flying in and out of the breakfast room.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel near the major sites in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Dutchtraveller37
Reviews.Content: Friendly staff, super location near the AyaSofia and Blue Mosque. Hotel is situated in a quiet street. Rooms are very comfortable and quiet. Breakfast restaurant has a nice view over the Bosporus.

Reviews.Title: “Great location in the Sultanahmet for tourists”
Reviews.Author: cathyPerth
Reviews.Content: Location was very convenient. We could here the trains noice from our room. Breakfast was good but could do with few more varieties. Good to have the service personal speak english. Tranport to the airport as advertised on the website if stayed for 3 + nights was not provided.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, fantastic staff”
Reviews.Author: LindaAbuDhabi
Reviews.Content: Good room , large enough and nicely appointed. Water pressure and temp excellent but shower over bath leaked & flooded the floor. No smoking rooms available. Breakfast amazing spread of different food- hot and cold. Internet available in lobby at the computer provided. Services of Obleisk hotel next door also available. Staff absolutely excellent, particularly front desk - nothing is too much trouble. Sedat Gok was especially helpful and friendly. The location of this hotel is fantastic - a shot walk to many sights and the tram station, many restaurants nearby - could not be better.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed it thoroughly”
Reviews.Author: mamakarachi
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Sumengen Hotel for 4 nights. Enjoyed every minute of it. Staff was friendly specially Ibrahim & Cedat. The room was great, location is excellent & the breakfast was good. Will definitely stay here again. Thank you for a lovely stay. My husband and I are already making plans for visiting Turkey & ofcourse Istanbul, again. Room no.502 specially is wonderful. Zahra & Qadir Sayeed. Karachi, Pakistan

Reviews.Title: “Centrally located, clean, comfortable, friendly and affordable”
Reviews.Author: drjones4ca
Reviews.Content: Located in the heart of the old city this hotel is an excellent hub from which to walk to almost any of Istanbul's sites to see. If you tire of walking the tram lines are also handy and inexpensive to use. You do not need any of the "pick-up" tour services with this location. Breakfasts are great, staff friendly and helpful. Do not confuse your cultural differences with uncooperativeness or unfriendliness, these are nice people. Free computer access in the lobby with 'available but spotty' wireless service in the rooms.

HotelInfo.Name: Sumengen Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Mimar Mehmet Aga Caddesi Amiral Tafdil Sokak | No 21 Sultanahmet, Istanbul 34100, Turkey
